lines.text:
[to the congregation]
We're going to build a house of worship here because you need a corral for all the stray calfs to be safe in.

[seeig the empty strong box left by Black Bart]
He left it as empty as Mother Hubbard's cupboard.

[to gang members about congregayopn]
... and when they start talkin' about puttin' a church bell in right in the middle of town, it's time to show them that Apache Butte ain't gonna be turned into no 'camp meetin' grounds.
I never knew deacons made a habit of carryin' guns.
Well, sometimes when you get into a tussle with the devil, you have to bark louder than you bite.

[to gang members about congregation]
... and when they start talkin' about puttin' a church bell in right in the middle of town, it's time to show them that Apache Butte ain't gonna be turned into no 'camp meetin' grounds.
